arts.ttl: Serie A | Roma 1-1 Napoli: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Serie A encounter at the Stadio Olimpico, AS Roma snatched a dramatic 1-1 draw against league leaders Napoli, courtesy of a stoppage-time strike from Angelino. The result ended Napoli's seven-game winning streak and prevented Antonio Conte's side from extending their lead at the top of the table. The post Serie A | Roma 1-1 Napoli: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
